greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of 10-D hypercubes in an n-dimensional hypercube.
comment: With a different offset, number of n-permutations (n>=8) of 3 objects: u, v, z with repetition allowed, containing exactly ten (10) u's.
link: M. Janjic and B. Petkovic, A Counting Function, arXiv 1301.4550 [math.CO], 2013.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (22,-220,1320,-5280,14784,-29568,42240,-42240,28160,-11264,2048).
formula: a(n) = binomial(n,10)*2^(n-10). [Corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 21 2010]
program: (Sage)[lucas_number2(n, 2, 0)*binomial(n,10)/2^10 for n in range(10, 31)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Feb 05 2010
results.author: _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jan 29 2010
